infos.name: Grußkarten
infos.description:
Sollen Ihre Kunden einen individuellen Text für eine Grußkarte eingeben können? - Mit dem Plugin "Grußkartenoption" von Repertus ist dies alles kein Problem!
Sie können verschiedene Grußkarten anbieten und selbst bestimmen, ob diese etwas kosten, und wie viele Zeichen pro Karte eingegeben werden können.
Bieten Sie Ihren Kunden ein wenig mehr Service, heben Sie sich von der Konkurrenz ab und steigern Sie so Ihre Conversionrate.

Features

  • Verschiedene Grußkarten im Backend anlegbar
  • Grußkarten als Artikel möglich (WaWi Abgleich)
  • Kostenlos oder kostenpflichtig
  • Anzahl der Karten pro Bestellung wählbar
  • Freie Auswahl der Textlänge
  • Extra Service für den Kunden
  • Ideal für Geschenke und alle Feiertage


Probleme?

Die meisten Fragen lassen sich bereits im Vorfeld klären. Aus diesem Grund bieten wir zu jedem Plugin ein Handbuch kostenlos zum Download an und haben zudem die häufigsten Fragen in unseren FAQs zusammengestellt.
Schauen Sie in unseren Supportbereich!

Hinweis

Jede Installation bzw. jedes Update eines Plugins in Ihrem Shopware Shop stellt eine Änderung der Software dar. Trotz unserer sowie von Seiten Shopware durchgeführter Maßnahmen zur Qualitätssicherung können wir daher nicht ausschließen, dass es während der Installation oder des Updates in Ausnahmefällen zu Problemen kommen kann.

Wir empfehlen grundsätzlich neue Plugins sowie das Einspielen von Updates von bereits installierten Plugins zunächst in einer geeigneten Testumgebung zu testen und diese nicht direkt in der Live-Umgebung einzuspielen sowie regelmäßig Backups Ihrer Live-Umgebung zu erstellen.

Über Repertus

Repertus ist ihr Softwareentwicklungs- und Dienstleistungsunternehmen mit Sitz in Berlin.
Unser Angebotsspektrum reicht von der E-Commerce Standardsoftware bis hin zu innovativen, individuell angefertigten Plugin Lösungen speziell auf Ihre Bedürfnisse und Anforderungen zugeschnitten.

infos.name: Greeting Cards
infos.description:
How about giving them the option to add a greeting card with a personalized text to their order? - With the plugin "Greeting Card Option", Repertus makes this all possible for you!
You can offer various greeting cards and decide if this option would cost anything and how many characters can be entered per card.
Offer a bit more service to your customers, stand out from the competition and increase your conversion rate.

Features

  • Various greeting cards to be chosen (one or more)
  • Text length as you wish
  • Free or at cost
  • Number of cards per order
  • Extra service for customers

Problems?

Most questions may be answered in advance. Therefore we offer for each plugin a user manual  and additionally collected the most common questions in our FAQs.

Visit our support section!

Disclaimer

Every installation or update of a plugin in your Shopware Shop constitutes a change of the software. Despite our quality assurance measures implemented by Shopware, we can not rule out that problems may arise during the installation or the update in exceptional cases.

We recommend testing new plug-ins and installing updates from already installed plug-ins in a suitable test environment, and not importing them directly into the live environment and regularly creating backups of your live environment.

About Repertus

Repertus is your software development and service company based in Berlin.
Our portfolio of services ranges from the standard e-commerce software to innovative, custom-made plugin solutions tailored to your needs and requirements.

Please contact us.
infos.shortDescription: The Greeting Cards Plugins allows your customers to add greeting cards to their orders. The customer has the possibility to add a personalized message to the card.

changelog.text: • Shopware 6.5 compatibility
• SW 6.5 Compatibility
• New Feature: maximum number of characters of the greeting card text is adjustable
• Enables the greeting cards to be sorted.
• Fixes a possible error when editing an order (in the administration)

• Establishes compatibility with SW6.4.14.0 
  • Fixes a problem with the frontend display when more than one greeting card exists

• New Feature: Edit greeting card text
  • improved greeting card slider
  • greeting card text configurable as mandatory field

• Changing the logic of greeting cards. Greeting cards now have the product type in the shopping cart.
  • Inventory is now correctly reduced after an order.
  • Greeting card information is now also stored in the payload.
  • The number of greeting cards in the shopping cart can now be adjusted.
  • Administration: When selecting a greeting card, you can now also see the variant information.
• Small bug fixes in the administration
• Fixes a potential problem when there are percentage discounts in Repertus LineItem containers

• Fixes a possible problem when increasing the quantity in checkout
  • Fixes a possible problem in the order overview
  • Fixes a possible problem when deleting greeting cards in checkout

• Fixes a possible problem that packaged articles are not listed in the order details in the administration.
  • Fixes a possible problem that packaged items are not listed in the order confirmation.
• Establishes compatibility with Shopware 6.4.0.0

• Establishes compatibility with SwagCustomProducts
  • "Add greeting card" is not displayed in the checkout until a greeting card is created in the backend
• Fixes a possible problem that prevented the number of greeting cards in the shopping cart from increasing
• Establishes compatibility with Shopware 6.3.
* added missing compiled code

• Fixes a possible problem, which can lead to an order failure if the same product with a greeting card is in the shopping cart several times.
  • Error messages in the shopping cart are no longer displayed twice.
  • Fixes a possible problem, which led to the possibility to remove a greeting card in the checkout finish.

• Fixes a possible problem that causes the greeting card not to be displayed in the order
  • Establishes compatibility with Item sets

• Fixes a possible bug where it was not possible to add a greeting card while the "Shopping cart only" setting was chosen
  • Fixes a possible error that could cause the prices of the greeting card to be rounded.
  • Fixes a possible error where deactivated greeting cards were shown in the frontned.
• First version of our plugin Age verification for Shopware 6.
